title: Warm Egg and Potato Salad with Spicy Peanut Sauce
ingredients: ['750g ready-washed baby new potatoes', '2 large carrots, peeled and cut into matchsticks', '125g fine green beans, cut into 2.5cm lengths', '1 small cauliflower, divided into small florets', '6 eggs, at room temperature', '1 tbsp sunflower oil', '1 garlic clove, crushed', '2.5cm piece fresh root ginger, peeled and grated', '1/4 tsp crushed chilli flakes', '1 tbsp lime juice', '1 tsp light muscovado sugar', '4 tbsp crunchy peanut butter', '1 tbsp olive oil', '1 tsp red wine vinegar']
